import React from "react"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import { FaLinkedin, FaGithub, FaKaggle, FaEnvelope } from "react-icons/fa"; const Hero = () => { return (
{/* Intro */} Hi, Iâ€™m Farrukh {/* Tagline */} Machine Learning Engineer | TinyML Deployment {/* Description */} I build intelligent and efficient AI systems that work in the real world. From fine-tuning large language models to compressing them for edge devices, I focus on making advanced AI practical for resource-constrained environments. My work bridges research and deployment, ensuring models are accurate, fast, and ready for production. {/* Social Icons */} {/* Buttons */} Hire Me View Resume
); }; export default Hero;
